p: To evaluate the in vivo effects of Fe 3O 4@EG nanosystems, suspensions were prepared in phosphate-buffered saline (1 mg/mL concentration) and subjected to UV treatment (30 min). Volumes of 100 μL from as-obtained sterile suspensions were aseptically administered into the left jugular vein of three-weeks-old BALB/c mice, under general anesthesia (Ketamine/Xylazine mixture). Reference mice were injected with 100 μL of phosphate-buffered saline (PBS). After inoculation, all animals were kept in standard conditions and received food and water ad libitum.
